default.shortDescription: Integrate your web apps with Microsoft 365
descriptionParagraphs: Bring information and insights from Microsoft 365 to your web app

detailItemCategories.name: Quick start
detailItemCategories.description: In 3 minutes build a simple app that connects to Microsoft 365
